contentfulSermon.title: This Functional Family: Week 4 - Church Family

fields.notesFormatted:
What is this thing we call a “Church?”

Matthew 16:18, 1 Corinthians 11:17-18

Why is the local church so important?

1 Corinthians 12:27, Ephesians 1:22-23, 1 Timothy 3:15, Romans 12:10-21, Hebrews 10:24-25

  • It functions as the body of Christ
  • It’s the pillar & foundation of the truth
  • It provides the lab for learning how to live like Jesus
  • It provides godly peer pressure

How does a healthy church function?

Matthew 28:18-20, 9:10-12, 1 John 2:3-5, 1 Peter 4:10-11

  • Reach out & recruit new followers of Jesus
  • Teach people how to live for Jesus
  • Deploys people into kingdom ministry
